mapper.select: select o.id,o.orderNumber,o.shouldReturnTime,od.realityBorrowMoney,od.interestSum,od.overdueNumberOfDays,od.interestPenaltySum from orders o inner join orderdetails od on o.id=od.orderid where o.companyId=#{arg0} and (o.orderStatus=0||o.orderStatus=1||o.orderStatus=2)
mapper.update: update orders set orderStatus=1 where id=#{arg0}
mapper.select: select id,productId,overdueHowmanydaysage,penaltyInterestRates,deleted from overdue_settings where companyId=#{arg0} and deleted=0 order by overdueHowmanydaysage
select o.id,o.userid,o.orderNumber,od.overdueNumberOfDays from orders o inner join orderdetails od on o.id=od.orderid where o.companyId=#{arg0} and o.orderStatus=1
